column4: I've got a problem with Wubi.  When I try to load Ubuntu, it takes me to a limited GRUBonDOS menu, and I don't know how to load Ubuntu from there.
does the menu list 2 boot options?
I know I had problems with Vista and wubi but not with win 7.  If you havnt uninstsalled the wubi from windows and reinstalled ubuntu with wubi sory I dont know beyond that
